snippet: The new law enforces a more rigid separation of sexes in schools and prohibits any relations with Israelis.
abstract: Hamas, Islamic group that rules the Palestinian Gaza Strip, issues new education law enforcing more rigid separation of sexes in schools and prohibiting any relations with Israelis, in line with its strictly religious and nationalist ideology; critics view law as latest move to impose more Islamic lifestyle on people of Gaza.
lead_paragraph: The new law enforces a more rigid separation of sexes in schools and prohibits any relations with Israelis.

headline.seo: Hamas Adds Restrictions on Gaza Schools
headline.main: Hamas Adds Restrictions on Schools and Israelis
headline.print_headline: Hamas Adds Restrictions On Schools And Israelis
